comment.author: 51039755@N05
comment._content: The above link takes you to the museum's website where the image can be zoomed. On the zoomed image a white line is visible just to the left of the head of the man painting by the WD number; if this white line is part of the last digit of the WD number then the WD number should be 9262. 9262 was hit and knocked out on 9th August 1918 whilst in action with "A" Company, 10th Tank Battalion. Source: sites.google.com/site/landships/home/lists/mk-v-tanks/925...
